title: Amazon announces massive investment in AI infrastructure for US federal agencies

title: What Is Genesis Mission? All You Need To Know About Trump's New AI Project
description: US President Donald Trump signed an executive order on Monday, Nov. 24, creating the “Genesis Mission”. It is a Federal programme designed to accelerate innovation through artificial intelligence. The new executive order unveiling the Genesis Mission lays out a comprehensive plan to enhance computational capacity, broaden access to extensive federal datasets and advance impactful AI applications, especially within scientific research.
content:

title: ‘All thanks to Nalanda’-tracing ancient university's influence in today’s math & AI at Jindal Lit Fest
description: Poet-turned-historian Abhay K speaks of Nalanda’s role in shaping today’s education, architecture, and even artificial intelligence.
content: Hisar: “The day of massacre at Nalanda. Bakhtiyar and his men play buzkashi in my alleys today. Monks are being burnt alive; and those who try to escape are beheaded… The light of the world is fading today to face the ravages of time alone, abandoned... [3097 chars]

title: AI still cannot crack your favourite comedian's puns, humans win this round
description: A new research has found that artificial intelligence (AI) has a hard time understanding puns. Researchers noted that Large Language Models (LLMs) will flag jokes even when the pun was removed from the sentence.
content: We all like puns. Puns are a simple way of using wordplay to make some humorous jokes. While there are times when our friend may take time to get a pun, we assume that artificial intelligence (AI) models would be clever enough to get all the jokes. H... [2766 chars]

title: Which degrees will AI never be able to replace?
description: As layoffs driven by artificial intelligence sweep across industries, a new report flips a long-held assumption on its head: the safest degrees for the future aren’t engineering at all, but fields powered by empathy, judgment, and hands-on decision-making that AI simply can’t mimic.

title: Boom Or Bust? What 'AI Bubble' Burst In US Could Mean For Indian Stock Market?
description: Wall Street's artificial intelligence (AI) bellwether, Nvidia, reported strong third quarter earnings last week, posting a double beat with revenue of $57 billion and an EPS at $1.30. The AI chip giant commands a market cap of $4.3 trillion after having hit the coveted $5-trillion mark earlier this year.

title: Ambassador Kwatra highlights opportunities for science, tech, AI cooperation with US
description: India's Ambassador to the United States, Vinay Mohan Kwatra met Congressman Jay Obernolte and held discussions with him to enhance the cooperation between India and the US in areas such as science, technology, artificial intelligence and innovation.
